original_title: Six injured in Delthota gas explosion
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Six people have sustained injuries after a gas cylinder exploded in a restaurant in Delthota, Kandy.
The injured, aged between 25 and 40 years, have been admitted to the Kandy National Hospital and Delthota Hospital.
